Content: Excellent service and price.
Excellent service.

I visited the shop in Norwich with a combination of old lenses, used camera's and accessories for trade in/up to buy a new camera to ideally take away on the day. The sales assistant (Dave) worked with me for around 1.5hrs to work through this. His product knowledge was excellent, everything I wanted was in stock and he worked through the trade in/up, money off etc offers to come up with the best price. Great service. Couldn't have been better.
Really competitive price, so much so I was initially suspicious!  (this was my first purchase). All was great though - fast delivery and exactly as advertised.  Delighted.  Would certainly buy again.
The drive left my delivery at the wrong address.  No explanation.  No card through my door.
Easy to order. Used items are always as described. Delivery is quick.

Fast delivery, had it in stock and always a easy service 
Highly recommend
Great quality used item delivered within the timescale quoted, excellent service as always
Excellent service. Delighted customer.
A really quick and helpful experience and what I wanted arrived safely and exactly in the condition that was advertised. The option to compare items helped me extremely well.

My purchases were delivered within 24 hours to the Isle of Wight using standard delivery, can't ask for more really can you?
Wish my normal mail came that quickly!!
Prompt and good value
Item as described and very good delivery

Item in stock

Next day delivery 
Will definitely use again
Excellent service we use them again arrived really quickly thank you
Good experience and helpful
Immediate dispatch, fast delivery and as advertised.
Excellent service

This was not the first pre-owned item that i have purchased from Wex and i would not hesitate to use them again.
The description is always very accurate and priced well.
I also traded in a Lens that i have not used for a while.(just sitting in the draw).Was offered more than i expected and used this to purchase a camera body.
So i would advise you all, if its not used sell it.
Must also add both transaction where very quick and trouble free
